f_set_tab_position../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_set_tab_positionset_tab_position (a_tab_position: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Display tabs at a_position. local gtk_pos: FalseINTEGER_32 do if a_tab_position = ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_notebook.xml#f_tab_leftTab_left then gtk_pos := 0 elseif a_tab_position = ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_notebook.xml#f_tab_rightTab_right then gtk_pos := 1 elseif a_tab_position = ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_notebook.xml#f_tab_topTab_top then gtk_pos := 2 elseif a_tab_position = ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_notebook.xml#f_tab_bottomTab_bottom then gtk_pos := 3 end {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_notebook_set_tab_posgtk_notebook_set_tab_pos (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget, gtk_pos) end
